ComicInfo.Penciller: Curt Swan,Leonard Starr,Will Ely,Leonard Starr,Curt Swan,Bill Ely
ComicInfo.Summary:
Dead Men Tell No Tales!: A crooked businessman tries to fool his partner by arranging for his brother's kidnapping.
Lady Luck Wore Black!: A gambler in Monaco meets a mysterious "Lady Luck" who lets him win all the time. It is, however, a set-up for international spies smuggling microfilms.
The Man Who Killed His Shadow: After having murdered the private detective Maxon, the gangster Nesbitt is followed by Maxon's bodiless shadow. He can't shake the crime re-enacting shadow of his victim and drives his car into a tree.
His Name on a Bullet!: Police detective lieutenant Hodges overcomes his superstitions. Having been shot, Hodges was convinced to be doomed, but pulls through in the hospital.
The Haunted Airfield: A take-off spot on an air field is supposed to be haunted.
ComicInfo.Title: Dead Men Tell No Tales!; Lady Luck Wore Black!; The Man Who Killed His Shadow; His Name on a Bullet!; The Haunted Airfield
ComicInfo.Characters: General George Custer,Henry Johnson,Dave,Eric Johnson,Arnold Miles,Julius Caesar
